1:
Thank Yahweh because he does good things for us;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
2:
Thank God, the one who is greater than all other gods;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
3:
Thank the Lord who is greater than all other lords;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.



\q1
4:
He is the only one who performs great miracles;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
5:
He is the one who, by being very wise, created the heavens;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.


\q1
6:
He is the one who caused the ground to rise up above the deep waters;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
7:
He is the one who created great lights in the sky;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.


\q1
8:
He created the sun to shine in the daytime;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
9:
He created the moon and stars to shine during the nighttime;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.



\q1
10:
He is the one who killed the firstborn males in Egypt;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
11:
He led the Israelite people out of Egypt;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
12:
With his strong hand he led them out;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.



\q1
13:
He is the one who caused the Sea of Reeds to divide;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
14:
He enabled the Israelite people to walk through it on dry land;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
15:
But he caused the king of Egypt and his army to drown in it;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.



\q1
16:
He is the one who led his people safely through the wilderness;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
17:
He killed powerful kings;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.


\q1
18:
He killed kings who were famous;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
19:
He killed Sihon, the king of the Amor people group;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
20:
He killed Og, the king of the region of Bashan;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.


\q1
21:
He gave their lands to us, his people;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
22:
He gave those lands to us people of Israel, who serve him;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
23:
He is the one who did not forget about us when our enemies had defeated us;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.


\q1
24:
He rescued us from our enemies;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
25:
He is the one who gives food to all living creatures;\q2 he will love us forever as he has promised.
\q1
26: So thank God, who lives in heaven\q2 because he will love us forever as he has promised.!
